elements.name: nps_value
elements.title: How likely are you to recommend Code.org to a friend or colleague?

elements.name: nps_details
elements.title: What are the top areas of our website and/or curriculum that we should focus on improving? (Choose up to 3)

validators.text: Please select a maximum of three areas

choices.text: Student sign-in and section set-up experience
Tracking student progress in courses or keeping students on-track
Grading student work, assessing student learning, or giving feedback to students
More support for different student skill levels in the same class
Navigating around the website or finding things on the website
More student-facing resources (videos, references, etc.) that explain CS concepts and/or support lesson activities
Fix bugs with the coding tools or website, or improve how quickly the website loads
Assign Code.org materials and track students' progress in Learning Management Systems (LMS)
Create new curriculum to cover additional subject areas, programming languages, or concepts, etc.
Improve lesson plans and curriculum resources in our existing courses to support teachers
Additional self-directed professional development for teachers (videos, online modules, etc.)

elements.name: nps_details_explanation
elements.title: Tell us more about your choice above
